column1: Little Goat Diner////Husband and I made it a point to split a bunch of plates so we could get the "full experience" (or at least the closest thing to it). Going by a bunch of Yelp reviews (A.B.Y. - Always Be Yelping)
column2: I navigated the menu and chose what sounded the best to us but also were crowd favourites. Here's the breakdown:
